TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

Docs.summary: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance> class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

Docs.summary: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see the [DsReplicaConsistencyCheck](/windows/desktop/api/ntdsapi/nf-ntdsapi-dsreplicaconsistencycheck) article.

Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfigurationSet As ConfigurationSet

Docs.summary: Gets the object for this AD LDS instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultPartition { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultPartition : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the default partition that this AD LDS instance serves.
Docs.value: A that contains the distinguished name of the default partition that this AD LDS instance serves. If the default partition is not set, this will return .
Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The partition name is not in a valid distinguished name format, or the AD LDS instance does not serve this partition. Applies to set only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

Docs.param: A value that determines if the managed resources should be released. if the managed resources should be released; if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Overrides the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAll(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName) cil managed
Public Shared Function FindAll (context As DirectoryContext, partitionName As String) As AdamInstanceCollection

Docs.param: A object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this context must be an AD LDS configuration set.
A that contains the name of the partition to search for AD LDS instances.
Docs.summary: Finds all AD LDS instances in the specified context that host the specified partition.
Docs.returns: A that contains the AD LDS instances that are found by the search.
Docs.exception: The or parameter is not valid.
No AD LDS instance was found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindOne(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName) cil managed
Public Shared Function FindOne (context As DirectoryContext, partitionName As String) As AdamInstance

Docs.param: A object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this context must be an AD LDS configuration set.
A that contains the name of the partition to search for an AD LDS instance.
Docs.summary: Finds a single AD LDS instance in the specified context that hosts the specified partition.
Docs.returns: A object that represents the AD LDS instance that is found by the search.
Docs.exception: No AD LDS instance was found.
The or parameter is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance GetAdamInstance(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetAdamInstance (context As DirectoryContext) As AdamInstance

Docs.param: A object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of the context must be an AD LDS instance.
Docs.summary: Returns an AD LDS instance for a specified context.
Docs.returns: An object that refers to the AD LDS instance that is found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance.GetAdamInstance%2A> method refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

Docs.exception: A connection to the target that was specified in the parameter could not be made.
